<test>1234.5***#,##0.00***1,234.50</test>
<test>0.25***#00c***25c</test>
<test>0.25***#00m***250m</test>
<test>0.736***#00c***74c</test>
<test>0.736***#00m***736m</test>
<test>1***#00c***100c</test>
<test>1***#00m***1000m</test>
<test>-42***#00c***-4200c</test>
<test>-42***#00m***-42000m</test>
<test>123abc***#c***NaN</test>
<test>-0.00***#,##0.00c***0.00c</test>
<test>-1234.5***'#'#,##0.00c'#'***-#123,450.00c#</test>
<test>-1234.5***?#,##0.00c?***-?123,450.00c?</test>
<test>-1234.5***?#,##0.00m?***-?1,234,500.00m?</test>
<test>1234.5***?#,##0.00c?***?123,450.00c?</test>
<test>1234.5***?#,##0.00m?***?1,234,500.00m?</test>
<test>-1234.5***-#,##0.00c***--123,450.00c</test>
<test>1 div 0***#***Infinity</test>
<test>-1 div 0***#***-Infinity</test>
